fields.name: AllowedDiskLevelOperation
fields.description: The disk level operations list.

fields.name: DataPendingAtSourceAgentInMB
fields.description: The data pending at source virtual machine in MB.

fields.name: DataPendingInStagingStorageAccountInMB
fields.description: The data pending for replication in MB at staging account.

fields.name: DekKeyVaultArmId
fields.description: The KeyVault resource id for secret (BEK).

fields.name: DiskCapacityInBytes
fields.description: The disk capacity in bytes.

fields.name: DiskId
fields.description: The managed disk Arm id.

fields.name: DiskName
fields.description: The disk name.

fields.name: DiskState
fields.description: The disk state.

fields.name: DiskType
fields.description: The type of disk.

fields.name: FailoverDiskName
fields.description: The failover name for the managed disk.

fields.name: IsDiskEncrypted
fields.description: A value indicating whether vm has encrypted os disk or not.

fields.name: IsDiskKeyEncrypted
fields.description: A value indicating whether disk key got encrypted or not.

fields.name: KekKeyVaultArmId
fields.description: The KeyVault resource id for key (KEK).

fields.name: KeyIdentifier
fields.description: The key URL / identifier (KEK).

fields.name: MonitoringJobType
fields.description: The type of the monitoring job. The progress is contained in MonitoringPercentageCompletion property.

fields.name: MonitoringPercentageCompletion
fields.description: The percentage of the monitoring job. The type of the monitoring job is defined by MonitoringJobType property.

fields.name: PrimaryDiskEncryptionSetId
fields.description: The primary disk encryption set Id.

fields.name: PrimaryStagingAzureStorageAccountId
fields.description: The primary staging storage account.

fields.name: RecoveryDiskEncryptionSetId
fields.description: The recovery disk encryption set Id.

fields.name: RecoveryOrignalTargetDiskId
fields.description: Recovery original target disk Arm Id.

fields.name: RecoveryReplicaDiskAccountType
fields.description: The replica disk type. Its an optional value and will be same as source disk type if not user provided.

fields.name: RecoveryReplicaDiskId
fields.description: Recovery replica disk Arm Id.

fields.name: RecoveryResourceGroupId
fields.description: The recovery disk resource group Arm Id.

fields.name: RecoveryTargetDiskAccountType
fields.description: The target disk type after failover. Its an optional value and will be same as source disk type if not user provided.

fields.name: RecoveryTargetDiskId
fields.description: Recovery target disk Arm Id.

fields.name: ResyncRequired
fields.description: A value indicating whether resync is required for this disk.

fields.name: SecretIdentifier
fields.description: The secret URL / identifier (BEK).

fields.name: TfoDiskName
fields.description: The test failover name for the managed disk.
